Amazon is offering some great deals on classy Lacoste pieces, including a standout selection of the classic Lacoste polo. It comes in a variety of colors from basics like black, white, and navy to pastel yellow and blue, and a good range of sizes is on sale for up to 50% off.

This polo is the tried-and-true classic most of us think of when we hear “Lacoste.” It’s timeless, effortless, and classy all at once. Part of Lacoste’s Sport collection, it provides comfort and functionality on the court while easily transitioning into an everyday wardrobe staple. Made with rip-resistant fabric, its durability and timeless look will keep it in your rotation for years to come. Grab your size on sale now while quantities last.
Shop the entire sale here.

The official Autel Amazon storefront is giving us even more savings than ever on its new 2-cam Outdoor Wireless Solar Security Camera kit at $156 shipped, which isn’t offered directly from the brand, while the 4-cam kit is down at $199 shipped, and does match its direct pricing. A new branch of Autel’s devices, these models have spent the time since their release in August through October keeping to their $299 and $399 price tags, which we’ve been seeing steadily ramping up discounts since early Black Friday sales. First they received cuts to $249 and $299, with the 2-cam pack then going lower to $199, while the 4-cam dropped to $254. Today’s deal brings larger-than-ever $143 and $200 markdowns off their full tag rates, landing them at new all-time low prices just in time to score them ahead of Christmas.

items.title: Apple holiday deals: Apple Watch Series 11 $100 off, AirPods Pro 3 $199 all-time low, more [Updated]
items.summary:
Black Friday and Cyber Monday are very much over, but the Apple deals certainly are not. Not only has the all-time low on AirPods Pro 3 returned alongside the ongoing offer on AirPods 4 with ANC at $99, but today has ushered in the very best price ever offered online for the new Apple Watch Series 11 lineup – all models are now $100 off starting from $299 to undercut the official Black Friday deals. Those deals join solid discounts across several of the latest-generation iPad lineups as well M4 Mac mini back at $479, and even more. Everything is organized for you below.

more…

items.title: Target officially announces last-minute Holiday Countdown Sale: 50% off toys, 40% off tech,  gift card bonuses, more
items.summary:
Alongside its holiday daily deals, it already pumped out quite a notable weekly holiday sale that kicked off on Sunday, but it isn’t done just yet. Ushering the best price yet on Apple Watch Series 11, its holiday sales (thus far) are not to be ignored, and not only does it have another weekly event inbound this weekend, it also announced an official last-minute Holiday Countdown Sale.
